long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Step into the world of magic and mayhem with our Bayonetta-themed live wallpaper extension!

🎨 Minimalist Design: A stylish interface inspired by Bayonetta’s elegance, power, and witchy aesthetic.
⏰ Clock and Date: Stay updated with a display that reflects the enchanting aura of Bayonetta.
🔗 Quick Access Shortcuts: Effortlessly navigate to your favorite websites.
🎮 Play Games: Explore action-packed, Bayonetta-inspired games directly from your shortcut panel.
🔍 Google Search Bar: Perform fast and efficient searches with your preferred engine.
🚀 More Extensions: Enhance your browsing experience with features as powerful and stylish as Bayonetta herself.
